title: Ayo...WHAT THAT MOUTH DO!? - One Piece Episode 533 + 534 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A combined reaction and review video covering One Piece episodes 533 and 534, including the Shirahoshi kidnapping and Hody Jones's attack on the palace.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for episodes 533-534 of the Fish-Man Island arc

title: IS HODY REALLY A THREAT? - One Piece Episode 533 and 534 - Rich Reaction
author: Rich Reaction
description: Reaction video questioning whether Hody Jones is truly a threat to the Straw Hats, covering episodes 533 and 534 of the Fish-Man Island arc.

title: Luffy's Master Plan! || One Piece Episode 532, 533 & 534 REACTION + REVIEW
author: Unknown Reactor
description: Multi-episode reaction and review covering episodes 532-534, focusing on Luffy's actions with Shirahoshi and the palace situation.

title: One Piece – Fishman Island Arc (Episodes 523 – 538) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the early portion of the Fishman Island arc, covering episodes 523-538. The review discusses the arc's slow start and character development, including the events of episode 534.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the first portion of the Fish-Man Island arc

title: 534-535: "The Ryugu Palace in Shock! The Kidnapping of Shirahoshi!" and "Hordy's Onslaught! The Retaliatory Plan Set Into Motion!"
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A detailed blog post analyzing episodes 534-535, discussing the generational conflict between Hachi and Hody Jones, the emotional weight of Shirahoshi's journey to her mother's grave, and the palace attack.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains detailed analysis and spoilers for episodes 534-535

title: One Piece: Why Fish-Man Island Is Far More Important Than You Think
author: Game Rant
description: An article exploring the deeper significance of the Fish-Man Island arc beyond its surface-level plot, discussing themes of racism, prejudice, and the importance of Queen Otohime's legacy.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Fish-Man Island arc and discusses its long-term significance
